mapper.select: SELECT addr.userID, addr.username, addr.userphone, addr.userEmail, addr.qq, addr.userAddress, logs.winningAt, logs.activityType, info.source FROM action_prizes_address_tb addr JOIN action_lottery_log_tb logs ON logs.activityId = addr.activityId and logs.userID = addr.userID JOIN action_user_info_tb info ON info.activityId = addr.activityId and info.userID = addr.userID WHERE 1 = 1 AND logs.activityId = 399 and addr.activityType = 'exchange' AND logs.prizeType = 'Invitation' order by winningAt DESC

SELECT TOP (#{pageSize}) A.* from ( SELECT TOP (#{pageSize}*#{currentPage}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY logs.winningAt DESC) AS row_num, addr.userID, addr.username, addr.userphone, addr.userEmail, addr.qq, addr.userAddress, logs.winningAt, logs.activityType, info.source FROM action_prizes_address_tb addr JOIN action_lottery_log_tb logs ON logs.activityId = addr.activityId and logs.userID = addr.userID JOIN action_user_info_tb info ON info.activityId = addr.activityId and info.userID = addr.userID WHERE 1 = 1 AND logs.userId = addr.userId AND logs.activityId = 399 AND addr.activityType ='exchange' AND logs.prizeType = 'Invitation' order by winningAt DESC ) A WHERE row_num > (#{pageSize}*(#{currentPage}-1))

SELECT count(1) FROM action_prizes_address_tb addr JOIN action_lottery_log_tb logs ON logs.activityId = addr.activityId JOIN action_user_info_tb info ON info.activityId = addr.activityId and info.userID = addr.userID WHERE 1 = 1 AND logs.userId = addr.userId AND logs.activityId = 399 AND addr.activityType ='exchange' AND logs.prizeType = 'Invitation'
